## <a name="india-permanent-account-number-pan"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4264">Номер постоянного счета Индии (PAN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4264">India permanent account number (PAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4265">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4265">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4266">10 букв или цифр.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4266">10 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4267">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4267">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4268">10 букв или цифр:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4268">10 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4269">пять букв (без учета регистра);</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4269">Five letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4270">Четыре цифры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4270">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4271">буква, которая является алфавитным проверочным символом.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4271">A letter which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4272">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4272">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4273">Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4273">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4274">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4274">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4275">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 85 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4275">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4276">регулярное выражение Regex_india_permanent_account_number находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4276">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4277">находится ключевое слово из Keyword_india_permanent_account_number;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4277">A keyword from Keyword_india_permanent_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4278">Контрольная сумма проходит проверку.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4278">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Permanent Account Number -->
<Entity id="2602bfee-9bb0-47a5-a7a6-2bf3053e2804" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_permanent_account_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4279">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4279">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_india_permanent_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4280">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4280">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4281">Permanent Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4281">Permanent Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4282">ПАНОРАМИРОВАНИЕ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4282">PAN</span></span> 
   
## <a name="india-unique-identification-aadhaar-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4283">Уникальный идентификационный номер (Aadhaar) Индии</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4283">India unique identification (Aadhaar) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4284">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4284">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4285">12 цифр, содержащих необязательные пробелы или тире.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4285">12 digits containing optional spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4286">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4286">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4287">12 цифр:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4287">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4288">четыре цифры;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4288">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4289">необязательный пробел или тире;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4289">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4290">четыре цифры;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4290">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4291">необязательный пробел или тире;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4291">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4292">последняя цифра — проверочная.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4292">The final digit which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4293">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4293">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4294">Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4294">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4295">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4295">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4296">Политика защиты от потери данных — 85% уверенности, что она обнаружила этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в пределах близости от 300 символов: функция Func_india_aadhaar находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4296">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters: The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4297">находится ключевое слово из Keyword_india_aadhar;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4297">A keyword from Keyword_india_aadhar is found.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4298">Контрольная сумма проходит проверку.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4298">The checksum passes.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4299">Политика защиты от потери данных — 75% уверенности, что она обнаружила этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в пределах близости от 300 символов: функция Func_india_aadhaar находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4299">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters: The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4300">Контрольная сумма проходит проверку.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4300">The checksum passes.</span></span>
```xml
<!-- India Unique Identification (Aadhaar) number -->
<Entity id="1ca46b29-76f5-4f46-9383-cfa15e91048f" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_aadhar"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4301">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4301">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_india_aadhar"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4302">Keyword_india_aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4302">Keyword_india_aadhar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4303">аадхар</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4303">Aadhar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4304">Aadhaar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4304">Aadhaar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4305">UID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4305">UID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4306">आधार</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4306">आधार</span></span>
   
## <a name="indonesia-identity-card-ktp-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4307">Номер идентификационной карточки Индонезия (KTP)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4307">Indonesia identity card (KTP) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4308">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4308">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4309">16 цифр, содержащих необязательные точки.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4309">16 digits containing optional periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4310">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4310">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4311">16 цифр:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4311">16 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4312">две цифры (код провинции);</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4312">Two-digit province code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4313">точка (необязательно);</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4313">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4314">две цифры (код округа или города);</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4314">Two-digit regency or city code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4315">две цифры (код района);</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4315">Two-digit subdistrict code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4316">точка (необязательно);</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4316">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4317">шесть цифр в формате ДДММГГ (дата рождения);</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4317">Six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4318">точка (необязательно);</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4318">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4319">четыре цифры.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4319">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4320">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4320">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4321">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4321">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4322">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4322">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4323">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4323">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4324">регулярное выражение Regex_indonesia_id_card находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4324">The regular expression Regex_indonesia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4325">находится ключевое слово из Keyword_indonesia_id_card.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4325">A keyword from Keyword_indonesia_id_card is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4326">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4326">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4327">регулярное выражение Regex_indonesia_id_card находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4327">The regular expression Regex_indonesia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Indonesia Identity Card (KTP) Number -->
<Entity id="da68fdb0-f383-4981-8c86-82689d3b7d55" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_indonesia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_indonesia_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_indonesia_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4328">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4328">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_indonesia_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4329">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4329">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4330">KTP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4330">KTP</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4331">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4331">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4332">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4332">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span></span> 
   
## <a name="international-banking-account-number-iban"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4333">Международный номер банковского счета (IBAN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4333">International banking account number (IBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4334">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4334">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4335">Код страны (две буквы), а также проверочные цифры (две) и номер bban (до 30 символов)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4335">Country code (two letters) plus check digits (two digits) plus bban number (up to 30 characters)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4336">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4336">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4337">Шаблон должен включать в себя все указанные ниже элементы.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4337">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4338">Двухбуквенный код страны</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4338">Two-letter country code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4339">Две проверочные цифры (после которых может следовать пробел) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4339">Two check digits (followed by an optional space)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4340">1–7 групп из четырех букв или цифр (могут разделяться пробелами)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4340">1-7 groups of four letters or digits (can be separated by spaces)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4341">1–3 буквы или цифры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4341">1-3 letters or digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4342">The format for each country is slightly different.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4342">The format for each country is slightly different.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4343">The IBAN sensitive information type covers these 60 countries:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4343">The IBAN sensitive information type covers these 60 countries:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4344">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4344">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4345">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4345">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4346">Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4346">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4347">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4347">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4348">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 85 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4348">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4349">функция Func_iban находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4349">The function Func_iban finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4350">Контрольная сумма проходит проверку.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4350">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="e7dc4711-11b7-4cb0-b88b-2c394a771f0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_iban" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4351">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4351">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4352">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4352">None</span></span>

   

   
## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-10-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4353">Международная классификация Diseases (ICD-10-CM)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4353">International classification of diseases (ICD-10-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4354">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4354">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4355">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4355">Dictionary</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4357">Keyword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4357">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4358">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4358">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4359">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4359">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4360">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4360">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4361">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 85 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4361">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4362">Найдено ключевое слово из Dictionary_icd_10_updated.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4362">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4363">Найдено ключевое слово из Dictionary_icd_10_codes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4363">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4364">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4364">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4365">Найдено ключевое слово из Dictionary_icd_10_ "Обновлено".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4365">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_ updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- ICD-10 CM -->
      <Entity id="3356946c-6bb7-449b-b253-6ffa419c0ce7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
        </Pattern>

```

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4366">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4366">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4367">Любой термин из словаря Dictionary_icd_10_updated ключевых слов, основанный на [международной классификации Diseases, десятой версии, Клиникал модификации (ICD-10-cm)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4367">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4368">Этот тип ищет только термин, а не коды страхования.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4368">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4369">Любой термин из словаря Dictionary_icd_10_codes ключевых слов, основанный на [международной классификации Diseases, десятой версии, Клиникал модификации (ICD-10-cm)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4369">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4370">Этот тип ищет только страховые коды, а не описание.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4370">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-9-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4371">Международная классификация Diseases (ICD-9-CM)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4371">International classification of diseases (ICD-9-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4372">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4372">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4373">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4373">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4374">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4374">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4375">Keyword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4375">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4376">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4376">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4377">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4377">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4378">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4378">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4379">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 85 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4379">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4380">Найдено ключевое слово из Dictionary_icd_9_updated.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4380">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4381">Найдено ключевое слово из Dictionary_icd_9_codes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4381">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4382">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4382">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4383">Найдено ключевое слово из Dictionary_icd_9_updated.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4383">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <Entity id="fa3f9c74-ee07-4c52-b5f2-085d6b2c0ec4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4384">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4384">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4385">Любой термин из словаря Dictionary_icd_9_updated ключевых слов, основанный на [международной классификации Diseases, девятой редакции, Клиникал модификации (ICD-9-cm)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4385">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4386">Этот тип ищет только термин, а не коды страхования.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4386">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4387">Любой термин из словаря Dictionary_icd_9_codes ключевых слов, основанный на [международной классификации Diseases, девятой редакции, Клиникал модификации (ICD-9-cm)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4387">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4388">Этот тип ищет только страховые коды, а не описание.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4388">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="ip-address"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4389">IP-адрес</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4389">IP address</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4390">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4390">Format</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv4"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4391">IPv4</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4391">IPv4:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4392">Сложный шаблон, ответственный за форматированные (с точками) и неформатированные (без точек) версии IPv4-адресов.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4392">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted (periods) and unformatted (no periods) versions of the IPv4 addresses</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv6"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4393">Поддерживающ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4393">IPv6:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4394"> Сложный шаблон, ответственный за форматированные номера IPv6 (вместе с двоеточиями).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4394">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted IPv6 numbers (which include colons)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4395">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4395">Pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4396">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4396">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4397">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4397">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4398">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4398">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4399">В случае с протоколом IPv6 политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 85 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, отдаленном не более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4399">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4400">регулярное выражение Regex_ipv6_address находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4400">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4401">ни одно ключевое слово из Keyword_ipaddress не находится.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4401">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4402">В случае с протоколом IPv4 политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 95 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, отдаленном не более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4402">For IPv4, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4403">регулярное выражение Regex_ipv4_address находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4403">The regular expression Regex_ipv4_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4404">находится ключевое слово из Keyword_ipaddress.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4404">A keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4405">В случае с протоколом IPv6 политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 95 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, отдаленном не более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4405">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4406">регулярное выражение Regex_ipv6_address находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4406">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4407">ни одно ключевое слово из Keyword_ipaddress не находится.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4407">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- IP Address -->
    <Entity id="1daa4ad5-e2dd-4ca4-a788-54722c09efb2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv4_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4408">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4408">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ipaddress"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4409">Keyword_ipaddress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4409">Keyword_ipaddress</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4411">ip address</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4411">ip address</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4413">internet protocol</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4413">internet protocol</span></span>

## <a name="ireland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4415">Номер водительского удостоверения для Ирландии</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4415">Ireland driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4416">Этот объект типа конфиденциальной информации доступен только в типе конфиденциальной информации номера лицензии для драйвера ЕС.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4416">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4417">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4417">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4418">Шесть цифр, за которыми следуют четыре буквы</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4418">Six digits followed by four letters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4419">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4419">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4420">Шесть цифр и четыре буквы:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4420">Six digits and four letters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4421">Шесть цифр</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4421">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4422">Четыре буквы (без учета регистра)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4422">Four letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4423">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4423">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4424">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4424">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4425">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4425">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4426">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4426">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4427">Регулярное выражение `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4427">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4428">Найдено ключевое слово FROM `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4428">A keyword from  `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4429">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4429">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4430">**Keywords_ireland_eu_driver "s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4430">**Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4431">DL #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4431">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4432">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4432">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4433">номер водительского удостоверения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4433">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4434">Лицензия на драйвер</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4434">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4435">Drivers лик.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4435">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4436">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4436">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4437">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4437">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4438">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4438">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4439">номер водительского удостоверения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4439">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4440">номер лицензии на драйвер</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4440">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4441">номер водительского удостоверения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4441">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4442">длно #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4442">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4443">цеадúнас тиомáна</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4443">ceadúnas tiomána</span></span>

## <a name="ireland-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4444">Национальный идентификационный номер для Ирландии</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4444">Ireland national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4445">Этот объект типа конфиденциальной информации включается только в тип конфиденциальной информации ЕС по национальному идентификационному номеру.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4445">This sensitive information type entity is only included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4446">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4446">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4447">Сочетание букв, цифр и пробела в указанном шаблоне.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4447">A nine-character combination of letters, digits, and a space in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4448">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4448">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4449">Сочетание букв, цифр и пробела в указанном шаблоне.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4449">A nine-character combination of letters, digits, and a space in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4450">От 01 января 2013 до Now:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4450">From 01 January 2013 to now:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4451">семь цифр;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4451">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4452">Одна контрольная цифра</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4452">One check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4453">Один пробел или буква в верхнем регистре "W" (с учетом регистра)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4453">One space or the uppercase letter "W" (Case sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4454">До 01 января 2013:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4454">Prior to 01 January 2013:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4455">семь цифр;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4455">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4456">Одна контрольная цифра</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4456">One check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4457">Один пробел или буква в верхнем регистре (с учетом регистра)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4457">One space or an uppercase letter (Case sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4458">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4458">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4459">Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4459">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4460">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4460">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4461">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 85 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4461">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4462">Функция находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4462">The function finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4463">Найдено ключевое слово FROM.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4463">A keyword from is found.</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4464">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4464">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4465">Функция находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4465">The function finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
    
```xml
 <!--Ireland national identification number  -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4494">Номер паспорта для Ирландии</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4494">Ireland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4495">Этот объект типа конфиденциальной информации доступен только в типе конфиденциальной информации номера паспорта ЕС.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4495">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4496">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4496">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4497">Две буквы или цифры, за которыми следуют семь цифр без пробелов и разделителей</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4497">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4498">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4498">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4499">Две буквы или цифры, за которыми следуют семь цифр:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4499">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4500">две цифры или буквы (без учета регистра);</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4500">Two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4501">семь цифр.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4501">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4502">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4502">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4503">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4503">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4504">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4504">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4505">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4505">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4506">Регулярное выражение `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4506">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4507">Найдено ключевое слово FROM `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4507">A keyword from  `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4508">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4508">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4509">**Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4509">**Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4510">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4510">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4511">Ирландский номер паспорта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4511">irish passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4512">паспорт нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4512">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4513">соответствующий</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4513">pas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4514">службу</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4514">passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4515">пассепорт</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4515">passeport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4516">пассепорт нумеро</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4516">passeport numero</span></span>

## <a name="ireland-personal-public-service-pps-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4517">Номер личной общедоступной службы (PPS) Ирландии</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4517">Ireland personal public service (PPS) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4518">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4518">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4519">Старый формат (до 31 декабря 2012):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4519">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4520">семь цифр, за которыми следуют 1–2 буквы. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4520">Seven digits followed by 1-2 letters</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4521">Новый формат (1 января 2013 и после):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4521">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4522">семь цифр, за которыми следуют две буквы.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4522">Seven digits followed by two letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4523">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4523">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4524">Старый формат (до 31 декабря 2012):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4524">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4525">семь цифр;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4525">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4526">1–2 буквы (без учета регистра).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4526">1-2 letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4527">Новый формат (1 января 2013 и после):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4527">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4528">семь цифр;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4528">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4529">буква (без учета регистра), которая является алфавитным проверочным символом;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4529">A letter (not case sensitive) which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4530">буква "A" или "H" (без учета регистра).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4530">The letter "A" or "H" (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4531">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4531">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4532">Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4532">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4533">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4533">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4534">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 85 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4534">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4535">Функция Func_ireland_pps находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4535">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4536">Верно одно из условий ниже:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4536">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4537">найдено ключевое слово из Keyword_ireland_pps;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4537">A keyword from Keyword_ireland_pps is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4538">функция Func_eu_date находит дату в правильном формате.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4538">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4539">Контрольная сумма проходит проверку.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4539">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4540">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 65 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, отдаленном не более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4540">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4541">функция Func_ireland_pps находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4541">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4542">Контрольная сумма проходит проверку.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4542">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Ireland Personal Public Service (PPS) Number -->
<Entity id="1cdb674d-c19a-4fcf-9f4b-7f56cc87345a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps"/>
     <Any minMatches="1">
  <Match idRef="Keyword_ireland_pps"/>
  <Match idRef="Func_eu_date"/>
     </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4547">PPS Num</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4547">PPS Num</span></span>

## <a name="ireland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4557">Идентификационный номер налога для Ирландии</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4557">Ireland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4558">Этот объект типа конфиденциальной информации доступен только в типе конфиденциальной информации по идентификационному номеру Европейского налога ЕС.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4558">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4559">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4559">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4560">Семь цифр, за которыми следует буква без пробелов и разделителей</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4560">Seven digits followed by a letter with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4561">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4561">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4562">Семь цифр, за которыми следует буква:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4562">Seven digits followed by a letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4563">семь цифр;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4563">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4564">Одна буква (без учета регистра)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4564">One letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4565">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4565">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4566">Неприменимо</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4566">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4567">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4567">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4568">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 85 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4568">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4569">Функция `Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4569">The function  `Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4570">Найдено ключевое слово FROM `Keywords_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4570">A keyword from  `Keywords_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4571">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4571">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4572">Функция `Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4572">The function  `Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="israel-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4601">Номер банковского счета для Израиля</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4601">Israel bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4602">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4602">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4603">13 цифр.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4603">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4604">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4604">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4605">Форматируемые</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4605">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4606">Две цифры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4606">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4607">Тире</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4607">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4608">Три цифры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4608">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4609">Тире</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4609">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4610">Восемь цифр</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4610">Eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4611">Неформатированные</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4611">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4612">	13 последовательных цифр.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4612">13 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4613">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4613">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4614">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4614">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4615">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4615">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4616">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4616">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4617">регулярное выражение Regex_israel_bank_account_number находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4617">The regular expression Regex_israel_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4618">находится ключевое слово из Keyword_israel_bank_account_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4618">A keyword from Keyword_israel_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="7d08b2ff-a0b9-437f-957c-aeddbf9b2b25" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_israel_bank_account_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_israel_bank_account_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4619">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4619">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_bank_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4620">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4620">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4621">Bank Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4621">Bank Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4622">Bank Account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4622">Bank Account</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4623">Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4623">Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4624">מספר חשבון בנק</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4624">מספר חשבון בנק</span></span> 
   
## <a name="israel-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4625">Национальный идентификационный номер Израиля</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4625">Israel national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4626">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4626">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4627">Девять цифр.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4627">Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4628">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4628">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4629">Девять последовательных цифр.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4629">Nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4630">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4630">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4631">Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4631">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4632">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4632">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4633">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4633">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4634">функция Func_israeli_national_id_number находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4634">The function Func_israeli_national_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4635">находится ключевое слово из Keyword_Israel_National_ID;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4635">A keyword from Keyword_Israel_National_ID is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4636">Контрольная сумма проходит проверку.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4636">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel National ID Number -->
<Entity id="e05881f5-1db1-418c-89aa-a3ac5c5277ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_israeli_national_id_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Israel_National_ID" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4637">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4637">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4638">Keyword_Israel_National_ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4638">Keyword_Israel_National_ID</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4639">מספר זהות</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4639">מספר זהות</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4640">National ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4640">National ID Number</span></span>
   
## <a name="italy-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4641">Номер водительского удостоверения для Италии</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4641">Italy driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4642">Этот объект типа конфиденциальной информации включен в тип конфиденциальной информации номера лицензии для драйвера ЕС и доступен как отдельный объект типа конфиденциальной информации.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4642">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4643">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4643">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4644">Сочетание из 10 букв и цифр.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4644">A combination of 10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4645">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4645">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4646">Сочетание 10 букв и цифр.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4646">A combination of 10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4647">Одна буква (без учета регистра)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4647">One letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4648">Буква "A" или "V" (без учета регистра)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4648">The letter "A" or "V" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4649">Семь букв (без учета регистра), цифр или символов подчеркивания</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4649">Seven letters (not case sensitive), digits, or the underscore character</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4650">Одна буква (без учета регистра)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4650">One letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4651">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4651">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4652">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4652">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4653">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4653">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4654">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4654">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4655">регулярное выражение Regex_italy_drivers_license_number находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4655">The regular expression Regex_italy_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4656">находится ключевое слово из Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4656">A keyword from Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Italy Driver's license Number -->
<Entity id="97d6244f-9157-41bd-8e0c-9d669a5c4d71" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4657">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4657">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_italy_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4658">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4658">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4659">numero di patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4659">numero di patente di guida</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4660">patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4660">patente di guida</span></span> 

## <a name="italy-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4661">Национальный идентификационный номер для Италии</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4661">Italy national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4662">Этот объект типа конфиденциальной информации доступен только в типе конфиденциальной информации ЕС по национальному идентификационному номеру.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4662">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4663">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4663">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4664">16 – символическое сочетание букв и цифр в указанном шаблоне.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4664">A 16-character combination of letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4665">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4665">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4666">16 – буквенное сочетание букв и цифр:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4666">A 16-character combination of letters and digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4667">Три буквы, соответствующие первым трем согласным в имени семейства</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4667">Three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4668">Три буквы, соответствующие первым, третьим и четвертым согласным в имени.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4668">Three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4669">Две цифры, соответствующие последним цифрам года рождения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4669">Two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4670">Одна буква, соответствующая букве дня рождения, буквы используются в алфавитном порядке, но используются только буквы от A до E, H, L, M, P, R — T (то есть Январь — это R, а Октябрь — R)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4670">One letter that corresponds to the letter for the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (thus, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4671">Две цифры, которые соответствуют дню месяца рождения, для различения пола, 40 добавляется в день рождения для женщин</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4671">Two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth—in order to differentiate between genders, 40 is added to the day of birth for women</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4672">Четыре цифры, соответствующие коду города, который относится к органу государственной власти, в котором был создан пользователь, (для иностранных стран используются коды уровня страны).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4672">Four digits that corresponds to the area code specific to the municipality where the person was born (country-wide codes are used for foreign countries)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4673">Одна цифра четности</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4673">One parity digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4674">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4674">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4675">Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4675">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4676">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4676">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4677">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 85 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4677">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4678">Функция `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4678">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4679">Найдено ключевое слово FROM `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4679">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4680">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4680">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-4681">Функция `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-4681">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- Italy national identification number -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
