## <a name="luxemburg-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5414">Номер паспорта Луксембург</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5414">Luxemburg passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5415">Этот объект типа конфиденциальной информации доступен только в типе конфиденциальной информации номера паспорта ЕС.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5415">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5416">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5416">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5417">Восемь цифр или букв без пробелов и разделителей</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5417">Eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5418">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5418">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5419">Восемь цифр или букв (без учета регистра)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5419">Eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5420">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5420">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5421">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5421">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5422">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5422">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5423">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5423">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5424">Регулярное выражение `Regex_nation_eu_passport_number` находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5424">The regular expression  `Regex_nation_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5425">Найдено ключевое слово FROM `Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5425">A keyword from  `Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_nation_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5426">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5426">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5427">**Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5427">**Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5428">номер паспорта латышский паспорт паспорт нет пасснуммер</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5428">passport number latvian passport number passport no passnummer</span></span>

## <a name="luxemburg-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5429">Идентификационный номер налога на Луксембург</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5429">Luxemburg tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5430">Этот объект типа конфиденциальной информации доступен только в типе конфиденциальной информации по идентификационному номеру Европейского налога ЕС.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5430">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5431">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5431">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5432">13 цифр без пробелов и разделителей</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5432">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5433">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5433">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5434">13 цифр:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5434">13 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5435">11 цифр.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5435">11 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5436">две проверочные цифры.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5436">Two check digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5437">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5437">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5438">Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5438">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5439">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5439">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5440">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 85 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5440">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5441">Функция `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5441">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5442">Найдено ключевое слово FROM `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5442">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5443">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5443">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5444">Функция `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5444">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malaysia-identification-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5484">Идентификационный номер карты Малайзии</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5484">Malaysia identification card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5485">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5485">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5486">12 цифр, содержащих необязательные дефисы.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5486">12 digits containing optional hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5487">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5487">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5488">12 цифр:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5488">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5489">шесть цифр в формате ГГММДД (дата рождения);</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5489">Six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5490">дефис (необязательно);</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5490">A dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5491">код места рождения из двух букв;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5491">Two-letter place-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5492">дефис (необязательно);</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5492">A dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5493">три случайные цифры;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5493">Three random digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5494">код пола из одной цифры.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5494">One-digit gender code</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5495">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5495">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5496">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5496">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5497">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5497">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5498">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 85 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5498">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5499">регулярное выражение Regex_malaysia_id_card_number находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5499">The regular expression Regex_malaysia_id_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5500">находится ключевое слово из Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5500">A keyword from Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Malaysia ID Card Number -->
</Entity>
      <Entity id="7f0e921c-9677-435b-aba2-bb8f1013c749" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malaysia_id_card_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5527">Номер водительского удостоверения для драйвера Мальта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5527">Malta driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5528">Этот объект типа конфиденциальной информации доступен только в типе конфиденциальной информации номера лицензии для драйвера ЕС.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5528">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5529">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5529">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5530">Сочетание двух символов и шести цифр в указанном шаблоне</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5530">Combination of two characters and six digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5531">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5531">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5532">Сочетание двух символов и шести цифр:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5532">Combination of two characters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5533">Два символа (цифры или буквы без учета регистра);</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5533">Two characters (digits or letters, not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5534">пробел (необязательно); </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5534">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5535">три цифры; </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5535">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5536">пробел (необязательно); </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5536">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5537">Три цифры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5537">Three digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5538">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5538">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5539">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5539">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5540">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5540">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5541">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5541">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5542">Регулярное выражение `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5542">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5543">Найдено ключевое слово FROM `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5543">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
 <Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5544">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5544">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5545">**Keywords_malta_eu_driver "s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5545">**Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5546">DL #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5546">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5547">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5547">driver license</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5549">Лицензия на драйвер</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5549">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5550">Drivers лик.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5550">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5551">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5551">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5552">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5552">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5553">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5553">driver's license</span></span>

## <a name="malta-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5559">Национальный идентификационный номер Мальта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5559">Malta national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5560">Этот объект типа конфиденциальной информации доступен только в типе конфиденциальной информации ЕС по национальному идентификационному номеру.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5560">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5561">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5561">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5562">Семь цифр, за которыми следует одна буква</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5562">Seven digits followed by one letter</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5563">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5563">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5564">Семь цифр, за которыми следует одна буква:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5564">Seven digits followed by one letter:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5565">семь цифр;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5565">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5566">Одна прописная буква (с учетом регистра)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5566">One uppercase letter (case sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5567">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5567">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5568">Неприменимо</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5568">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5569">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5569">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5570">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5570">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5571">Регулярное выражение `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5571">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5572">Найдено ключевое слово FROM `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5572">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5573">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 65 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, отдаленном не более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5573">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5574">Регулярное выражение `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5574">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!--Malta national identification number  -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5575">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5575">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5576">Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5576">Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5578">ID ТАТ — такскса</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5578">id tat-taxxa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5579">идентифика нумру Тал билжетт</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5579">identifika numru tal-biljett</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5580">кодиċи нумерали персонали</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5580">kodiċi numerali personali</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5581">нумру Ta ' идентификаззжони персонали</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5581">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni personali</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5582">нумру Ta ' идентификаззжони ТАТ такскса</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5582">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni tat-taxxa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5583">нумру Ta ' идентификаззжони унику</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5583">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni uniku</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5584">нумру Ta ' идентитà унику</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5584">numru ta' identità uniku</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5585">нумруные зада сервизз таċ ċиттадин</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5585">numru tas-servizz taċ-ċittadin</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5586">нумру ТАТ — такскса</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5586">numru tat-taxxa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5587">персональный числовой код</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5587">personal numeric code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5588">уникальный идентификационный номер</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5588">unique identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5589">уникальный идентификационный номер</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5589">unique identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5590">уникуеидентитино #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5590">uniqueidentityno#</span></span>


## <a name="malta-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5591">Номер паспорта для Мальта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5591">Malta passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5592">Этот объект типа конфиденциальной информации доступен только в типе конфиденциальной информации номера паспорта ЕС.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5592">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5593">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5593">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5594">Семь цифр без пробелов и разделителей</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5594">Seven digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5595">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5595">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5596">семь цифр.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5596">Seven digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5597">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5597">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5598">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5598">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5599">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5599">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5600">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5600">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5601">Регулярное выражение `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5601">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5602">Найдено ключевое слово FROM `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5602">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5603">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5603">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5604">**Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5604">**Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5605">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5605">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5606">номер паспорта Мальтийский</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5606">maltese passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5607">паспорт нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5607">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5608">нумру Тал — пассапорт</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5608">numru tal-passaport</span></span>

## <a name="malta-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5609">Идентификационный номер налога Мальта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5609">Malta tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5610">Этот объект типа конфиденциальной информации доступен только в типе конфиденциальной информации по идентификационному номеру Европейского налога ЕС.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5610">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5611">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5611">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5612">Для национальных замальтийский: 7 цифр и одна буква в указанном шаблоне</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5612">For Maltese nationals: 7 digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5613">Мальтийскийные страны и Мальтийский, не являющиеся субъектами: 9 цифр</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5613">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: 9 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5614">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5614">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5615">Мальтийский национальные условия: 7 цифр и одна буква</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5615">Maltese nationals: 7 digits and one letter</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5616">семь цифр;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5616">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5617">Одна буква (без учета регистра)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5617">One letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5618">Мальтийскийные страны и Мальтийский, не являющиеся субъектами: 9 цифр</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5618">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: 9 digits</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5619">девять цифр.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5619">Nine digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5620">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5620">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5621">Неприменимо</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5621">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5622">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5622">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5623">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5623">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5624">Функция `Func_malta_eu_tax_file_number` находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5624">The function  `Func_malta_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5625">Найдено ключевое слово FROM `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5625">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5626">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 65 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, отдаленном не более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5626">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5627">Функция `Func_malta_eu_tax_file_number` находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5627">The function  `Func_malta_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5628">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5628">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5629">Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5629">Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5630">номер службы для себя</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5630">citizen service number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5631">ID ТАТ — такскса</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5631">id tat-taxxa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5632">идентифика нумру Тал билжетт</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5632">identifika numru tal-biljett</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5633">кодиċи нумерали персонали</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5633">kodiċi numerali personali</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5634">нумру Ta ' идентификаззжони персонали</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5634">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni personali</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5635">нумру Ta ' идентификаззжони ТАТ такскса</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5635">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni tat-taxxa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5636">нумру Ta ' идентификаззжони унику</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5636">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni uniku</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5637">нумру Ta ' идентитà унику</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5637">numru ta' identità uniku</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-citizens-service-bsn-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5660">Номер службы (BSN) для Нидерландов</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5660">Netherlands citizen's service (BSN) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5661">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5661">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5662">8–9 цифр, содержащих необязательные пробелы.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5662">8-9 digits containing optional spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5663">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5663">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5664">8–9 цифр:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5664">8-9 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5665">три цифры; </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5665">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5666">пробел (необязательно); </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5666">A space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5667">три цифры; </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5667">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5668">пробел (необязательно); </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5668">A space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5669">2–3 цифры.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5669">2-3 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5670">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5670">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5671">Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5671">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5672">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5672">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5673">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 85 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5673">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5674">функция Func_netherlands_bsn находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5674">The function Func_netherlands_bsn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5675">находится ключевое слово из Keyword_netherlands_bsn;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5675">A keyword from Keyword_netherlands_bsn is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5676">функция Func_eu_date2 находит дату в правильном формате.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5676">The function Func_eu_date2 finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5677">Контрольная сумма проходит проверку.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5677">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Netherlands Citizen's Service (BSN) Number -->
<Entity id="c5f54253-ef7e-44f6-a578-440ed67e946d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
       <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_bsn" /> 
       <Match idRef="Keyword_netherlands_bsn" /> 
       <Match idRef="Func_eu_date2" /> 
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5690">персунсжебонден</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5690">persoonsgebonden</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5691">персунснуммер</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5691">persoonsnummer</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5697">униек идентитеитснуммер</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5697">uniek identiteitsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5698">уникальный идентификационный номер</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5698">unique identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5699">уникальный идентификационный номер</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5699">unique identity number</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5701">Номер водительского удостоверения для Нидерландов</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5701">Netherlands driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5702">Этот объект типа конфиденциальной информации доступен только в типе конфиденциальной информации номера лицензии для драйвера ЕС.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5702">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5703">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5703">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5704">10 цифр без пробелов и разделителей</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5704">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5705">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5705">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5706">10 цифр.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5706">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5707">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5707">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5708">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5708">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5709">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5709">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5710">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5710">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5711">Регулярное выражение `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5711">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5712">Найдено ключевое слово FROM `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5712">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5713">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5713">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5714">**Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver "s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5714">**Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5717">номер водительского удостоверения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5717">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5718">Лицензия на драйвер</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5718">driver licence</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5723">номер водительского удостоверения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5723">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5724">номер лицензии на драйвер</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5724">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5725">номер водительского удостоверения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5725">driving license number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5728">рижбевижс</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5728">rijbewijs</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5729">рижбевижснуммер</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5729">rijbewijsnummer</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5730">Национальный идентификационный номер Нидерландов</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5730">Netherlands national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5731">Этот объект типа конфиденциальной информации доступен только в типе конфиденциальной информации ЕС по национальному идентификационному номеру.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5731">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5732">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5732">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5733">Девять цифр без пробелов и разделителей</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5733">Nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5734">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5734">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5735">Девять цифр.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5735">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5736">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5736">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5737">Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5737">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5738">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5738">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5739">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 85 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5739">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5740">Функция `Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card` находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5740">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5741">Найдено ключевое слово FROM.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5741">A keyword from is found.</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5742">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5742">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5743">Функция `Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card` находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5743">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!--Netherland national identification number  -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5767">Номер паспорта Нидерландов</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5767">Netherlands passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5768">Этот объект типа конфиденциальной информации доступен только в типе конфиденциальной информации номера паспорта ЕС.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5768">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5769">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5769">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5770">Девять букв или цифр без пробелов и разделителей</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5770">Nine letters or digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5771">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5771">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5772">Девять букв или цифр;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5772">Nine letters or digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5773">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5773">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5774">Неприменимо</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5774">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5775">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5775">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5776">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5776">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5777">Регулярное выражение `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5777">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5778">Найдено ключевое слово FROM `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5778">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5779">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5779">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5780">**Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5780">**Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5781">номер паспорта для нидерландского языка</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5781">dutch passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5782">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5782">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5783">номер паспорта Нидерландов</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5783">netherlands passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5784">недерланден паспурт нуммер</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5784">nederlanden paspoort nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5785">паспурт</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5785">paspoort</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5786">недерланден паспуртнуммер</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5786">nederlanden paspoortnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5787">паспуртнуммер</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5787">paspoortnummer</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5788">Идентификационный номер налога Нидерландов</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5788">Netherlands tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5789">Этот объект типа конфиденциальной информации доступен только в типе конфиденциальной информации по идентификационному номеру Европейского налога ЕС.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5789">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5790">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5790">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5791">Девять цифр без пробелов и разделителей</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5791">Nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5792">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5792">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5793">Девять цифр.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5793">Nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5794">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5794">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5795">Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5795">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5796">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5796">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5797">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 85 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5797">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5798">Функция `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5798">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5799">Найдено ключевое слово FROM `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5799">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5800">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5800">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5801">Функция `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5801">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-ministry-of-health-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5839">Номер министерства здоровья Новой Зеландии</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5839">New Zealand ministry of health number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5840">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5840">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5841">Три буквы, пробел (необязательно) и четыре цифры.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5841">Three letters, a space (optional), and four digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5842">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5842">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5843">Три буквы (без учета регистра), пробел (необязательно) из четырех цифр.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5843">Three letters (not case sensitive) a space (optional) four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5844">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5844">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5845">Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5845">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5846">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5846">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5847">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 85 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5847">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5848">функция Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5848">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5849">находится ключевое слово из Keyword_nz_terms;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5849">A keyword from Keyword_nz_terms is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5850">Контрольная сумма проходит проверку.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5850">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- New Zealand Health Number -->
<Entity id="2b71c1c8-d14e-4430-82dc-fd1ed6bf05c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_nz_terms" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5851">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5851">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5852">Keyword_nz_terms</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5852">Keyword_nz_terms</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5853">нхи</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5853">NHI</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5854">Новая Зеландия</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5854">New Zealand</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5855">Здравоохранение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5855">Health</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5856">обращения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5856">treatment</span></span> 
   
## <a name="norway-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5857">Идентификационный номер Норвегии</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5857">Norway identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5858">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5858">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5859">11 цифр.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5859">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5860">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5860">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5861">11 цифр:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5861">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5862">шесть цифр в формате ДДММГГ (дата рождения);</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5862">Six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5863">индивидуальный номер из трех цифр;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5863">Three-digit individual number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5864">две проверочные цифры.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5864">Two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5865">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5865">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5866">Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5866">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5867">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5867">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5868">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 85 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5868">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5869">функция Func_norway_id_number находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5869">The function Func_norway_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5870">находится ключевое слово из Keyword_norway_id_number;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5870">A keyword from Keyword_norway_id_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5871">Контрольная сумма проходит проверку.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5871">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5872">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5872">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5873">функция Func_norway_id_numbe находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5873">The function Func_norway_id_numbe finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5874">Контрольная сумма проходит проверку.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5874">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Norway Identification Number -->
<Entity id="d4c8a798-e9f2-4bd3-9652-500d24080fc3" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5875">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5875">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_norway_id_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5876">Keyword_norway_id_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5876">Keyword_norway_id_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5879">ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5879">ID Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5880">Процедура</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5880">Identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5881">персоннуммер</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5881">Personnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5882">фøдселснуммер</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5882">Fødselsnummer</span></span>

   
## <a name="philippines-unified-multi-purpose-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5883">Идентификационный номер единой системы для различных целей Филиппины</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5883">Philippines unified multi-purpose identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5884">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5884">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5885">12 цифр, разделенных дефисами.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5885">12 digits separated by hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5886">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5886">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5887">12 цифр:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5887">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5888">четыре цифры;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5888">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5889">дефис;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5889">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5890">семь цифр;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5890">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5891">дефис;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5891">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5892">одна цифра.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5892">One digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5893">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5893">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5894">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5894">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5895">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5895">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5896">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5896">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5897">регулярное выражение Regex_philippines_unified_id находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5897">The regular expression Regex_philippines_unified_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5898">находится ключевое слово из Keyword_philippines_id.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5898">A keyword from Keyword_philippines_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Philippines Unified Multi-Purpose ID number -->
<Entity id="019b39dd-8c25-4765-91a3-d9c6baf3c3b3" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_philippines_unified_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_philippines_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5899">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5899">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_philippines_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5900">Keyword_philippines_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5900">Keyword_philippines_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5901">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5901">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5902">умид</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5902">UMID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5903">Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5903">Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5904">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5904">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span></span>

## <a name="poland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5905">Номер водительского удостоверения для драйвера Польша</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5905">Poland driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5906">Этот объект типа конфиденциальной информации доступен только в типе конфиденциальной информации номера лицензии для драйвера ЕС.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5906">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5907">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5907">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5908">14 цифр, содержащих 2 косых черты.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5908">14 digits containing 2 forward slashes</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5909">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5909">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5910">14 цифр и 2 косых черт:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5910">14 digits and 2 forward slashes:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5911">Пять цифр</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5911">Five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5912">косая черта;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5912">A forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5913">Две цифры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5913">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5914">косая черта;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5914">A forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5915">семь цифр.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5915">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5916">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5916">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5917">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5917">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5918">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5918">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5919">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5919">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5920">Регулярное выражение `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5920">The regular expression  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5921">Найдено ключевое слово FROM `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5921">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5922">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5922">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5923">**Keywords_poland_eu_driver "s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5923">**Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5924">DL #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5924">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5925">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5925">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5926">номер водительского удостоверения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5926">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5927">Лицензия на драйвер</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5927">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5928">Drivers лик.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5928">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5929">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5929">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5930">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5930">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5931">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5931">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5932">номер водительского удостоверения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5932">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5933">номер лицензии на драйвер</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5933">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5934">номер водительского удостоверения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5934">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5935">длно #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5935">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5936">право жазди</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5936">prawo jazdy</span></span>

## <a name="poland-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5937">Идентификационная карточка Польша</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5937">Poland identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5938">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5938">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5939">Три буквы и шесть цифр.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5939">Three letters and six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5940">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5940">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5941">Три буквы (без учета регистра), за которыми следуют шесть цифр.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5941">Three letters (not case sensitive) followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5942">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5942">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5943">Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5943">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5944">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5944">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5945">Политика защиты от потери данных — 75% уверенности, что она обнаружила этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в пределах близости от 300 символов: функция Func_polish_national_id находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5945">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters: The function Func_polish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5946">находится ключевое слово из Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5946">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5947">Контрольная сумма проходит проверку.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5947">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Identity Card-->
<Entity id="25E64989-ED5D-40CA-A939-6C14183BB7BF" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5949">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5949">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5950">Довóд особисти</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5950">Dowód osobisty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5951">Нумер доводу особистего</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5951">Numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5952">Назва i нумер доводу особистего</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5952">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-5953">Назва i НР доводу особистего</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-5953">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span></span>
