## <a name="swift-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7123">Код SWIFT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7123">SWIFT code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7124">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7124">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7125">Четыре буквы, за которыми следуют от 5 до 31 буквы или цифры.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7125">Four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7126">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7126">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7127">Четыре буквы, за которыми следуют от 5 до 31 буквы или цифры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7127">Four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7128">Четырехбуквенный код банка (без учета регистра)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7128">Four-letter bank code (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7129">Необязательный пробел</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7129">An optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7130">4–28 букв или цифр (основной номер банковского счета, BBAN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7130">4-28 letters or digits (the Basic Bank Account Number (BBAN))</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7131">Необязательный пробел</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7131">An optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7132">1–3 буквы или цифры (оставшаяся часть BBAN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7132">1-3 letters or digits (remainder of the BBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7133">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7133">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7134">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7134">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7135">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7135">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7136">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7136">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7137">регулярное выражение Regex_swift находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7137">The regular expression Regex_swift finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7138">находится ключевое слово из Keyword_swift.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7138">A keyword from Keyword_swift is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="cb2ab58c-9cb8-4c81-baf8-a4e106791df4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_swift" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_swift" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7172">Национальный идентификационный номер для Тайваня</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7172">Taiwan national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7173">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7173">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7174">Одна буква (английская), за которой следуют девять цифр.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7174">One letter (in English) followed by nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7175">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7175">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7176">Один символ , за которым следуют девять цифр</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7176">One letter (in English) followed by nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7177">Один символ (на английском языке, без учета регистра)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7177">One letter (in English, not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7178">Цифра 1 или 2</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7178">The digit "1" or "2"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7179">Восемь цифр</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7179">Eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7180">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7180">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7181">Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7181">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7182">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7182">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7183">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 85 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7183">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7184">функция Func_taiwanese_national_id находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7184">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7185">находится ключевое слово из Keyword_taiwanese_national_id;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7185">A keyword from Keyword_taiwanese_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7186">Контрольная сумма проходит проверку.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7186">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwanese National ID -->
<Entity id="4C7BFC34-8DD1-421D-8FB7-6C6182C2AF03" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwanese_national_id" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7192">身份證號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7192">身份證號</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7195">身分證號碼</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7195">身分證號碼</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7196">身份證號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7196">身份證號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7197">身分證統一編號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7197">身分證統一編號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7198">國民身分證統一編號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7198">國民身分證統一編號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7199">簽名</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7199">簽名</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7201">簽名或蓋章</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7201">簽名或蓋章</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7202">簽章</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7202">簽章</span></span>   
   
## <a name="taiwan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7203">Номер паспорта для Тайваня</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7203">Taiwan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7204">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7204">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7205">Номер биометрического паспорта: девять цифр</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7205">Biometric passport number: Nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7206">Номер биометрической службы Passport: девять цифр</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7206">Non-biometric passport number: Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7207">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7207">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7208">Номер биометрического паспорта:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7208">Biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7209">цифра "3";</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7209">The digit "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7210">восемь цифр.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7210">Eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7211">Номер биометрической службы Passport:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7211">Non-biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7212">девять цифр.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7212">Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7213">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7213">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7214">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7214">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7215">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7215">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7216">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7216">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7217">регулярное выражение Regex_taiwan_passport находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7217">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7218">находится ключевое слово из Keyword_taiwan_passport.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7218">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="e7251cb4-4c2c-41df-963e-924eb3dae04a" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_passport"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_passport"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-resident-certificate-arctarc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7229">Номер сертификата резидента (ARC/TARC) для Тайваня</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7229">Taiwan resident certificate (ARC/TARC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7230">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7230">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7231">10 букв и цифр.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7231">10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7232">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7232">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7233">10 букв и цифр:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7233">10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7234">две буквы (без учета регистра);</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7234">Two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7235">восемь цифр.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7235">Eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7236">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7236">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7237">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7237">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7238">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7238">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7239">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7239">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7240">регулярное выражение Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7240">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7241">находится ключевое слово из Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7241">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Resident Certificate (ARC/TARC) -->
<Entity id="48269fec-05ea-46ea-b326-f5623a58c6e9" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7242">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7242">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="thai-population-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7255">Код идентификации для тайского заполнения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7255">Thai population identification code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7256">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7256">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7257">13 цифр.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7257">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7258">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7258">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7259">13 цифр:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7259">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7260">Первая цифра не равна 0 или 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7260">First digit is not 0 or 9</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7261">12 цифр.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7261">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7262">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7262">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7263">Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7263">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7264">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7264">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7265">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 85 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7265">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7266">Функция Func_Thai_Citizen_Id находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7266">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7267">Найдено ключевое слово из Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7267">A keyword from Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7268">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7268">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7269">Функция Func_Thai_Citizen_Id находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7269">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Thai Citizen ID -->
-<Entity id="44ca9e86-ead7-4c5d-884a-e2eaa401515e" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7272">ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7272">ID Number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7274">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7274">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7275">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7275">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7276">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7276">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7277">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7277">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
  
## <a name="turkish-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7278">Турецкий национальный идентификационный номер</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7278">Turkish national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7279">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7279">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7280">11 цифр.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7280">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7281">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7281">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7282">11 цифр.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7282">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7283">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7283">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7284">Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7284">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7285">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7285">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7286">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 85 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7286">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7287">Функция Func_Turkish_National_Id находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7287">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7288">Найдено ключевое слово из Keyword_Turkish_National_Id.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7288">A keyword from Keyword_Turkish_National_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7289">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7289">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7290">Функция Func_Turkish_National_Id находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7290">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Turkish National Identity -->
-<Entity id="fb621f20-3876-4cfc-acec-8c8e73ca32c7" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7291">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7291">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_turkish_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7292">Keyword_Turkish_National_Id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7292">Keyword_Turkish_National_Id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7293">TC Кимлик No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7293">TC Kimlik No</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7295">Ватандаşлıк нумарасı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7295">Vatandaşlık numarası</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7296">Ватандаşлıк нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7296">Vatandaşlık no</span></span>

## <a name="uk-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7297">Королевств</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7297">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7298">номер водительского удостоверения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7298">driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7299">Этот объект типа конфиденциальной информации включен в тип конфиденциальной информации номера лицензии для драйвера ЕС и доступен как отдельный объект типа конфиденциальной информации.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7299">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7300">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7300">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7301">Сочетание 18 букв и цифр в указанном формате.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7301">Combination of 18 letters and digits in the specified format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7302">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7302">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7303">18 букв и цифр</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7303">18 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7304">Пять букв (без учета регистра) или цифра 9 вместо буквы</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7304">Five letters (not case sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7305">Одна цифра</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7305">One digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7306">Пять цифр в формате даты ММДДИ для даты рождения (седьмой символ увеличивается на 50, если драйвер — гнездо, то есть 51 – 62, а не с 01 – 12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7306">Five digits in the date format MMDDY for date of birth (7th character is incremented by 50 if driver is female, i.e. 51 to 62 instead of 01 to 12)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7307">Две буквы (без учета регистра) или цифра 9 вместо буквы</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7307">Two letters (not case sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7308">Пять цифр</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7308">Five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7309">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7309">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7310">Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7310">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7311">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7311">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7312">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7312">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7313">функция Func_uk_drivers_license находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7313">The function Func_uk_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7314">находится ключевое слово из Keyword_uk_drivers_license;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7314">A keyword from Keyword_uk_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7315">Контрольная сумма проходит проверку.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7315">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="f93de4be-d94c-40df-a8be-461738047551" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7321">motor cars</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7321">motor cars</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7322">125cc</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7322">125cc</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7323">сидекар</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7323">sidecar</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7324">трициклес</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7324">tricycles</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7325">моторциклес</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7325">motorcycles</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7326">photocard licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7326">photocard licence</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7329">licence holders</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7329">licence holders</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7330">driving licences</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7330">driving licences</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7331">driving licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7331">driving licence</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7332">dual control car</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7332">dual control car</span></span> 
   
## <a name="uk-electoral-roll-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7333">Королевств</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7333">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7334">номер рулона електорал</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7334">electoral roll number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7335">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7335">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7336">Две буквы, за которыми следуют 1–4 цифры.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7336">Two letters followed by 1-4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7337">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7337">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7338">Две буквы (без учета регистра), за которыми следуют 1–4 цифры.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7338">Two letters (not case sensitive) followed by 1-4 numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7339">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7339">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7340">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7340">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7341">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7341">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7342">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7342">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7343">регулярное выражение Regex_uk_electoral находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7343">The regular expression Regex_uk_electoral finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7344">находится ключевое слово из Keyword_uk_electoral.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7344">A keyword from Keyword_uk_electoral is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Electoral Number -->
<Entity id="a3eea206-dc0c-4f06-9e22-aa1be3059963" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_uk_electoral" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_electoral" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7345">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7345">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_electoral"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7346">Keyword_uk_electoral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7346">Keyword_uk_electoral</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7347">council nomination</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7347">council nomination</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7348">nomination form</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7348">nomination form</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7349">electoral register</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7349">electoral register</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7350">electoral roll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7350">electoral roll</span></span>

   
## <a name="uk-national-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7351">Королевств</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7351">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7352">Национальный номер службы работоспособности</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7352">national health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7353">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7353">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7354">10–17 цифр, разделенных пробелами.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7354">10-17 digits separated by spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7355">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7355">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7356">10-17 цифр</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7356">10-17 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7357">3 или 10 цифр</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7357">Either 3 or 10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7358">Пробел</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7358">A space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7359">Три цифры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7359">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7360">Пробел</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7360">A space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7361">Четыре цифры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7361">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7362">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7362">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7363">Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7363">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7364">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7364">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7365">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 85 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7365">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7366">Функция Func_uk_nhs_number находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7366">The function Func_uk_nhs_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7367">Верно одно из условий ниже:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7367">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7368">найдено ключевое слово из Keyword_uk_nhs_number;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7368">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7369">найдено ключевое слово из Keyword_uk_nhs_number1;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7369">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7370">найдено ключевое слово из Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7370">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7371">Контрольная сумма проходит проверку.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7371">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NHS Number -->
<Entity id="3192014e-2a16-44e9-aa69-4b20375c9a78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nhs_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7372">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7372">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_uk_nhs_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7373">Keyword_uk_nhs_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7373">Keyword_uk_nhs_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7374">national health service</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7374">national health service</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7375">NHS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7375">nhs</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7376">health services authority</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7376">health services authority</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7377">health authority</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7377">health authority</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_nhs_number1"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7378">Keyword_uk_nhs_number1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7378">Keyword_uk_nhs_number1</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7379">patient id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7379">patient id</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7380">patient identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7380">patient identification</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7381">patient no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7381">patient no</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7382">patient number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7382">patient number</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7383">Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7383">Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7384">ГРУПП</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7384">GP</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7385">доб</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7385">DOB</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7386">D. O. B</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7386">D.O.B</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7387">Date of Birth</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7387">Date of Birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7388">Birth Date</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7388">Birth Date</span></span> 
   
## <a name="uk-national-insurance-number-nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7389">Королевств</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7389">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7390">Национальный страховой номер (Нино)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7390">national insurance number (NINO)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7391">Этот объект типа конфиденциальной информации включен в тип конфиденциальной конфиденциальной информации ЕС Идентификаитон и доступен как отдельный объект типа конфиденциальной информации.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7391">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identificaiton Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7392">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7392">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7393">7 символов или 9 символов, разделенных пробелами или тире</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7393">7 characters or 9 characters separated by spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7394">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7394">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7395">Два возможных шаблона:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7395">Two possible patterns:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7396">Две буквы (допустимые Нинос используют только определенные символы в этом префиксе, которые пропускаются при проверке этого шаблона; без учета регистра)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7396">Two letters (valid NINOs use only certain characters in this prefix, which this pattern validates; not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7397">Шесть цифр</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7397">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7398">"A", "B", "C", или "'D" (например, префикс, в суффиксе допускаются только определенные символы; без учета регистра)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7398">Either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D' (like the prefix, only certain characters are allowed in the suffix; not case sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7399">OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7399">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7400">Две буквы</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7400">Two letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7401">Пробел или тире</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7401">A space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7402">Две цифры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7402">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7403">Пробел или тире</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7403">A space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7404">Две цифры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7404">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7405">Пробел или тире</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7405">A space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7406">Две цифры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7406">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7407">Пробел или тире</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7407">A space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7408">Значение "A", "B", "C" или "'D"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7408">Either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D'</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7409">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7409">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7410">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7410">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7411">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7411">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7412">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 85 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7412">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7413">функция Func_uk_nino находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7413">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7414">находится ключевое слово из Keyword_uk_nino.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7414">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7415">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7415">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7416">функция Func_uk_nino находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7416">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7417">ни одно ключевое слово из Keyword_uk_nino не находится.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7417">No keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NINO -->
<Entity id="16c07343-c26f-49d2-a987-3daf717e94cc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7424">social security number
</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7424">social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7425">insurance application
</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7425">insurance application</span></span>

</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7426">medical application</span></span>

</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7427">social insurance</span></span>

## <a name="uk-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7432">Королевств</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7432">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7433">идентификационный номер налога</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7433">tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7434">Этот объект типа конфиденциальной информации доступен только в типе конфиденциальной информации по идентификационному номеру Европейского налога ЕС.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7434">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7435">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7435">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7436">Уникальная справочная информация о налогоплательщиках (утр): 10 цифр без пробелов и разделителей</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7436">Unique Taxpayer Reference (UTR): 10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
 
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7437">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7437">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7438">Уникальная справочная информация о налогоплательщиках (утр): 10 цифр</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7438">Unique Taxpayer Reference (UTR): 10 digits</span></span>

  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7439">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7439">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7440">Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7440">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7441">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7441">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7442">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7442">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7443">Функция `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7443">The function  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7444">Найдено ключевое слово FROM `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7444">A keyword from  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7464">Номер банковского счета США</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7464">U.S. bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7465">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7465">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7466">8-17 цифр</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7466">8-17 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7467">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7467">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7468">8–17 последовательных цифр</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7468">8-17 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7469">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7469">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7470">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7470">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7471">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7471">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7472">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7472">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7473">регулярное выражение Regex_usa_bank_account_number находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7473">The regular expression Regex_usa_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7474">находится ключевое слово из Keyword_usa_Bank_Account.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7474">A keyword from Keyword_usa_Bank_Account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="a2ce32a8-f935-4bb6-8e96-2a5157672e2c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_usa_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_usa_Bank_Account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7504">Номер водительского удостоверения для драйвера США</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7504">U.S. driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7505">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7505">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7506">Зависит от штата.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7506">Depends on the state</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7507">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7507">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7508">В зависимости от штата. Например, для Нью-Йорка:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7508">Depends on the state -- for example, New York:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7509">Девять цифр, отформатированных как DDD DDD DDD, будут совпадают.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7509">Nine digits formatted like ddd ddd ddd will match.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7510">Не подойдут девять цифр в формате ццццццццц.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7510">Nine digits like ddddddddd will not match.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7511">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7511">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7512">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7512">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7513">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7513">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7514">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7514">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7515">функция Func_new_york_drivers_license_number находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7515">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7516">находится ключевое слово из Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7516">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7517">обнаружено ключевое слово из списка Keyword_us_drivers_license.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7517">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7518">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 65 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, отдаленном не более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7518">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7519">функция Func_new_york_drivers_license_number находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7519">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7520">находится ключевое слово из Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7520">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7521">находится ключевое слово из Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7521">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7522">ни одно ключевое слово из Keyword_us_drivers_license не находится.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7522">No keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="dfeb356f-61cd-459e-bf0f-7c6d28b458c6 patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-individual-taxpayer-identification-number-itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7620">Индивидуальный идентификационный номер налогоплательщика (SHAREPOINTВ) для США</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7620">U.S. individual taxpayer identification number (ITIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7621">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7621">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7622">Девять цифр, которые начинаются с "9" и содержат "7" или "8" в качестве четвертой цифры, отформатированных с помощью пробелов или тире (необязательно).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7622">Nine digits that start with a "9" and contain a "7" or "8" as the fourth digit, optionally formatted with spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7623">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7623">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7624">Форматируемые</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7624">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7625">Цифра 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7625">The digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7626">Две цифры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7626">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7627">Пробел или тире</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7627">A space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7628">Цифра 7 или 8</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7628">A "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7629">Одна цифра</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7629">A digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7630">Пробел или тире</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7630">A space, or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7631">Четыре цифры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7631">Four digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7632">Неформатированные</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7632">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7633">Цифра 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7633">The digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7634">Две цифры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7634">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7635">Цифра 7 или 8</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7635">A "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7636">Пять цифр</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7636">Five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7637">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7637">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7638">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7638">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7639">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7639">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7640">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 85 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7640">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7641">Функция Func_formatted_itin находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7641">The function Func_formatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7642">Верно по меньшей мере одно из условий ниже:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7642">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7643">найдено ключевое слово из Keyword_itin;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7643">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7644">функция Func_us_address находит адрес в правильном формате;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7644">The function Func_us_address finds an address in the right date format.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7645">функция Func_us_date находит дату в правильном формате.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7645">The function Func_us_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7646">найдено ключевое слово из Keyword_itin_collaborative.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7646">A keyword from Keyword_itin_collaborative is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7647">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7647">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7648">Функция Func_unformatted_itin находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7648">The function Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7649">Верно по меньшей мере одно из условий ниже:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7649">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7650">найдено ключевое слово из Keyword_itin_collaborative;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7650">A keyword from Keyword_itin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7651">функция Func_us_address находит адрес в правильном формате;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7651">The function Func_us_address finds an address in the right date format.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7652">функция Func_us_date находит дату в правильном формате.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7652">The function Func_us_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN) -->
<Entity id="e55e2a32-f92d-4985-a35d-a0b269eb687b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_address" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_date" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_itin_collaborative" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_itin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_address" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_date" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7673">Номер социального страхования (SSN) США</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7673">U.S. social security number (SSN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7674">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7674">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7675">9 цифр в виде форматированного или неформатированного шаблона.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7675">9 digits, which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7676">Есть SSN выдан до середины 2011 г., он отличается строгим форматированием, при котором определенные части номера должны входить в указанные диапазоны (при этом нет контрольной суммы).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7676">If issued before mid-2011, an SSN has strong formatting where certain parts of the number must fall within certain ranges to be valid (but there's no checksum).</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7677">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7677">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7678">Четыре функции выполняют поиск SSN с использованием четырех разных шаблонов:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7678">Four functions look for SSNs in four different patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7679">Func_ssn находит SSN со строгим форматированием с тире или пробелами, выданные до 2011 г. (ццц-цц-цццц ИЛИ ццц цц цццц);</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7679">Func_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7680">Func_unformatted_ssn находит SSN со строгим форматированием, выданные до 2011 г. (без форматирования в виде девяти последовательных цифр — ццццццццц);</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7680">Func_unformatted_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7681">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn находит SSN с тире или пробелами, выданные после 2011 г. (ццц-цц-цццц ИЛИ ццц цц цццц);</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7681">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7682">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn находит SSN без форматирования в виде девяти последовательных цифр, выданные после 2011 г. (ццццццццц).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7682">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7683">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7683">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7684">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7684">No</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7685">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7685">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7686">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 85 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7686">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7687">Функция Func_ssn находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7687">The function Func_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7688">Находится ключевое слово из Keyword_ssn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7688">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7689">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7689">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7690">Функция Func_unformatted_ssn находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7690">The function Func_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7691">Находится ключевое слово из Keyword_ssn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7691">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7692">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 65 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, отдаленном не более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7692">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7693">Функция Func_randomized_formatted_ssn находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7693">The function Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7694">Находится ключевое слово из Keyword_ssn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7694">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7695">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 55 % верно обнаружила этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в пределах ближайших 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7695">A DLP policy is 55% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7696">Функция Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7696">The function Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7697">Находится ключевое слово из Keyword_ssn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7697">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>


```xml
<!-- U.S. Social Security Number (SSN) -->
  <Entity id="a44669fe-0d48-453d-a9b1-2cc83f2cba77" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_formatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="55">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
  </Entity>
```

## <a name="us--uk-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7708">США/ВЕЛИКОБРИТАНИЯ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7708">U.S. / U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7709">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7709">passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7710">Великобритания</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7710">The U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7711">Объект типа конфиденциальной информации номера паспорта доступен в типе конфиденциальной информации номера паспорта ЕС и доступен как отдельный объект типа конфиденциальной информации.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7711">passport number sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7712">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7712">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7713">Девять цифр.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7713">Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7714">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7714">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7715">Девять последовательных цифр.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7715">Nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7716">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7716">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7717">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7717">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7718">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7718">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7719">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7719">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7720">функция Func_usa_uk_passport находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7720">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3ab51-7721">находится ключевое слово из Keyword_passport.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3ab51-7721">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="178ec42a-18b4-47cc-85c7-d62c92fd67f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
